headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Hasta La Vista
content:
It’s dangerous business riding a bicycle around Los Santos. Sometimes it feels like the motorists have it out for you. Sometimes, they really do. Case in point: Hasta La Vista, the Adversary Mode wherein the cyclists must do their best to outpace, outmaneuver and somehow escape a pursuing truck — or two. Survive, or end up a smear on the side of the road.

Whatever the outcome, all players who complete a round of Hasta La Vista will earn triple GTA$ and RP, all week long.
